name: Louis and the secrets of the Golden Acorns
name_original: Louis and the secrets of the Golden Acorns
description:
This game uses Web Monetization to give you a hint on the next move by highlighting the tiles reachable in 1 move.

The objective of the game is, with Louis, to collect an acorn and reach the delivery point.

In each level you can find a secret golden acorn: all together will unlock an exclusive bonus level! If you don't know where to look for them, try to read the title of the level you're in.

In addition, by reaching the delivery point with an adequate number of moves, you will also get a silver acorn: these will unlock another bonus level if collected in their entirety.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You can use the WASD keys or the directional arrows to move Louis.
To reset the level you can press R.
To return to the main menu ESC.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

What I would like to improve

Gameplay
-  Add several more types of tiles, to offer a much greater number of interactions
-  Add new levels
-  Diversify level goals

Graphics
-  Animations for jumping and animated sprite
-  Better integrated tiles with the terrain and non-monochrome background
-  Animations of various types and effects
